title: From Cozy Knits to Date-Night Dresses, Anthropologie Has All The Must-Have Winter Staples
description: Winter is here, and it’s the perfect time to kick off your 2025 wardrobe with seasonally fit finds from reader-favorite Anthropologie. From warm jackets and cozy knits for outdoor days to cute tops for layering (and keeping in rotation come spring), the retailer’s latest arrivals have your cold-weather needs covered. Amongst the new drop, you’ll also find versatile loungewear — think sweatshirts that pair seamlessly with leggings, denim, trousers, and beyond, as well as joggers that wouldn’t look out of place underneath a winter coat — because even though bed rotting is so last season, coziness is forever. Plus, Anthropologie’s new arrivals include event-ready picks and date-night outfits, whether you’re planning a Valentine’s Day look or gearing up for a winter wedding. Keep clicking to shop our favorite new arrivals ahead. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.Summer introWe know you love Anthropologie just as much as we do. Whether you are searching for a new trendy piece of clothing to fit into your current wardrobe, need a new belt to match your new shoes, or just simply want a new date night dress, Anthropologie’s new arrivals section is the place to be. But, going through a new arrivals section can seem daunting — like entering a cave of glittering treasures on all sides — so, we took it upon ourselves to assist you by finding the trendiest pieces that the retailer has to offer so you can snatch them up before they sell out. Summer time is just the occasion to go through your wardrobe and find all the style gaps that you may have missed while being bundled up in the same two puffer jackets all winter. And, if you have trouble keeping up with the new Anthropologie dresses or denim drops, fear not because we've sifted through the retailer’s new arrivals sectione for the best of the best summer styles to add to your closet.Whether you're looking to keep up with 2024 denim trends, find your next wedding guest dress, or build yourvacation wardrobe, Anthropologie has a host of new options to pick from.
